content: --प्राण, --असु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} having little power or strength, having short breath, asthmatic; °णश्च क्रियासु भवति <ls>Suśr.</ls> (--णः {1} slight breathing or weak aspiration. {2} (in <ab>gram.</ab>) a name given to the unaspirated letters of the alphabet (in pronouncing which little effort is required); अयुग्मा वर्गयमगा यणश्चाल्पासवः स्मृताः <ls>Sk.</ls> {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} the vowels, semivowels, nasals and the letters क् च् ट् त् प् ग् ज् ड् द् ब्.
